Plot categorical data as interaction plots, slopegraphs, and raincloud plots.


## Learning objectives

* Plot means and error bars as interaction plots
* Connect paired individual data with slopegraphs
* Combine density plots, dotplots, and boxplots in raincloud plots


## Pre-meeting

To prepare for this class meeting, please do the following:
